head1: TOPIC 1: Calculate the sum of k-different digits, k digits that can be formed using n given digits
head2: TOPIC 2: Calculate the sum of even numbers, odd numbers consisting of k-different digits, k digits that can be formed using n given digits
head3: TOPIC 3: Find the subsets X' of the set X such that the numbers have k different digits, k digits are made up of X' and know the sum ranging from m to M. Calculate probability
setInputLabel: Set of n elements, input as 1,2,3...n
sumInRange: Sum ranges (the more range covers, the time it costs)
